### Workshop: SciK-Health â€“ Scientific Knowledge in Health

**Date:** May 28, 2025\
**Location:** Department of Economics and Statistics (DiSES), University of Naples Federico II

This workshop marks a key milestone in the SciK-Health project, presenting the project website, data repository structure, and analytical framework. The event introduces the main performance indicators developed to evaluate Italian public Academic Health Science Centres across multiple dimensions: bibliometric impact, social and digital engagement, industrial innovation, clinical research activity, and funding capacity.

The workshop provides an overview of the data collection strategy, the structure of the relational database, and the preliminary design of the interactive dashboard. It also discusses dissemination strategies and outreach activities to maximize the project's impact on research policy and decision-making.
